fields.name: req_convert_success_msg
fields.fieldText: Selected Requisitions has been converted into Purchase Order Successfully.

fields.name: navigate_message
fields.fieldText: Please click 'Finish' to navigate to Inventory Requisition list view, otherwise close the tab.

fields.name: req_convert_success_msg1
fields.fieldText:
﻿Selected Requisitions has been successfully converted into Purchase Order {!Get_Created_POLOADER_Detail.rstk__poloader_pohdr__r.Name} and opened in a separate new tab.


Please click 'Finish' to navigate to Inventory Requisition list view, otherwise close the tab.

fields.name: select_record
fields.fieldText: Please select at least one record to convert into PO.

fields.name: MaxIcreq
fields.fieldText: A maximum of 45 requisitions can be processed at a time. Please use the Inventory workbench for more than 45 requisitions.

fields.name: has_unapprove_req_message
fields.fieldText: Only Approved Requisitions can be converted into Purchase Order.
